bike.description: Specialized Myka A1 Premium Aluminum 26" frame, fully butted, Women's Recreational XC geometry and tubesets, double ORE DT, externally relieved HT, forged dropouts w/ replaceable alloy hanger

components.description: SR Suntour M3020, custom women's coil/MCU spring, steel steerer, preload adj., 1 pc alloy "V" brake only lower, 25.4mm steel stanchions, mini boot seals, 75mm travel
Hi-Ten riser bar, 620mm & 640mm wide, 35mm rise, 8º backsweep, 4º upsweep, 25.4mm
Specialized Women's BodyGeometry XCT, Kraton rubber w/ gel, closed end, 120mm
Shimano ST-EF51, 7-speed, trigger and integrated brake lever w/ optical display
KMC Z-7, 7-speed w/ reusable Missing Link
HR "V" brake rim, 26", alloy double-wall, CNC braking surface, pin joint, 25mm, 32h
Alloy "V" brake hub, sealed loose bearing, steel axle, QR, 32h
Alloy "V" brake hub, sealed loose bearing, steel axle, QR, 32h
Specialized Fast Trak Sport, 26"x2.0", wire bead, 40TPI
Specialized Fast Trak Sport, 26"x2.0", wire bead, 40TPI
Specialized Women's BodyGeometry Riva WMN Sport, steel rails, 155mm width
Alloy two bolt, 12.5mm offset, micro adjust, 30.9mm, 300mm or 350mm
chainstay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
